metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16119 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Fresh is a module used by the Express.js framework for HTTP response freshness testing. It is vulnerable to a regular expression denial of service when it is passed specially crafted input to parse. This causes the event loop to be blocked causing a denial of service condition.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16119` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-fresh - 0.5.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-fresh package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.5.2-1').
